about_the_game:
This content is included with the Season Pass for Warhammer: Chaosbane.

This content pack includes:
• An emote pack with a bonus emote for each playable character
• A bonus that can be equipped in your inventory to increase your chances of finding rare items

Save money on bonus content for Warhammer: Chaosbane by purchasing the Season Pass.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence

detailed_description:
This content is included with the Season Pass for Warhammer: Chaosbane.

This content pack includes:
• An emote pack with a bonus emote for each playable character
• A bonus that can be equipped in your inventory to increase your chances of finding rare items

Save money on bonus content for Warhammer: Chaosbane by purchasing the Season Pass.

name: Warhammer: Chaosbane - Emotes 2 & Blessing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64bits version of Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3 or AMD Phenom™ II X3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7850 with 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64bits version of Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5 or AMD FX 8150
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 with 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard

short_description: This content is included with the Season Pass for Warhammer: Chaosbane. This content pack includes: • An emote pack with a bonus emote for each character • A bonus to increase your chances of finding rare items
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
